title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       Medical Information Call 911 for emergency medical or police assistance or to report accidents or injuries. If you have any concerns or questions, please contact the park at 973-523-0370. The tour route is located in a busy urban area, with both paved and unpaved sections.  Tours can be accessible with assistance.  The tour route travels through the Great Falls Historic District, which is managed by the City of Paterson and includes visitor facilities such as the Paterson Museum.  If you have any questions regarding this facility, please call the Paterson Museum at 973-321-1260 Monday - Sunday (except federal and city holidays).  The park's Welcome Center is accessible with assistance.
